channel.title: You decide
channel.description:
Hi again, Well i built not long a go a command generator for my utility, Next it was a Shop Maker, And im having trouble on what else to make.
Any one got anything in mind?

item.title: You decide
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“xx nub xx, post:8, topic:155981”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=212843.msg1859652#msg1859652 date=1193913297]
perhaps you could make a server that isn’t increibly lame?
[/quote]

ive never seen your server, but if i did it would probably be “lame” so don’t talk[/quote]

It wouold be lame because 99% of servers are lame.

anyway, idea: perhps an autoer for a sever?

Read full topic

item.title: You decide
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

So does anyone have any more ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: You decide
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

highest i had without lag was 152, 155 is when it lagged a bit then people kept saying this server is uncrashable cause 200 nulls just logged in -would make 350 something people but 200 nulls-
so i had 155 REAL players and 200 nulls, then 1 person logged in it crashed and it would never go back up so i quit hosting it ;(
You didnt answer me and xx nub xx, ive never edited drops before

Read full topic

item.title: You decide
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Lawl. 160 wasn’t the max, i limited it, 160 is when it started to lagg a little 200 when i lagged 250 is when it lagged bad and 400 is when it closed down Rofl.

Read full topic

item.title: You decide
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“owner Ethan, post:12, topic:155981”][quote author=dog eats dog link=topic=212843.msg1859672#msg1859672 date=1193914468]

perhaps you could make a server that isn’t increibly lame?

I closed my server down 3 months ago, And i dare

ive never seen your server, but if i did it would probably be “lame” so don’t talk

I closed my server down 3 months ago, And i dare you to say that to the 160 people that was on my server Daily
[/quote]
160?! i was only 4 people away from you til i quit hosting that gay server
i suggest you make a npcdrop maker or something, i have trouble with editing drops all the time im still getting used to it[/quote]

wait you said your server got a max of 156 people… yet you have trouble adding monster drops?? what kind of server was it then

Read full topic

item.title: You decide
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“xx nub xx, post:4, topic:155981”][quote author=dog eats dog link=topic=212843.msg1859641#msg1859641 date=1193912867]

hmm maybe an autospawn generator? just put in the npc ID (or name if you want it to be really good but that would be hard cuz you would have to be able to convert each name into an ID) and the coords… although not really useful for the more advanced people since autospawns are so easy to make… but then again arnt commands and shops? well anyway theres my idea

You make a Shop and Command generator, Its harder then you think.
And a autospawn generator, IDK, Put it in the maybe pile.
[/quote]

never said a generator wasnt hard… i meant writing the code by hand wasnt too hard if you know what your doing… but these are aimed at beginners no?[/quote]

Aimed at anyone who doesn’t know how to code, And to give a break for senior coders, From writing a code from scratch.

Read full topic
